      "code": "from typing import Callable, Any

class ThreadWithLock:
    def __init__(self, target: Callable[[], Any], name: str = None):
        super().__init__()
        self.name = name or threading.current_thread().name
        self._target = target
        self._lock = threading.Lock()

    def run(self) -> Any:
        with self._lock:
            if not self._is_running.get():
                self._is_running.set(True)
                threading.Thread(target=self._run_wrapper).start()
        return self._result

    def _run_wrapper(self) -> None:
        try:
            self._result = self._target()
        finally:
            with self._lock:
                self._is_running.set(False)"
